original_title: Mike Peters - On The Road To Recovery
overview: As shown on the BBC, â€˜MIKE PETERS [ON THE ROAD TO RECOVERY] is an intimate portrait of the Peters Family as they face the realities of cancer and infertility.  Fully expanded to include over 60 minutes of never before seen footage this unique documentary features the original 30 minute broadcast plus an inspiring brand new 90 minute feature length film about Mike, Jules & Dylan Peters as they deal with all that life has to throw at them.
tagline: Mike Peters - On The Road To Recovery
title: Mike Peters - On The Road To Recovery
